response.overview: A darkness swirls at the center of a world-renowned dance company, one that will engulf the artistic director, an ambitious young dancer, and a grieving psychotherapist. Some will succumb to the nightmare. Others will finally wake up.
response.tagline: Give your soul to the dance.
response.title: Suspiria

cast.name: Tilda Swinton
cast.character: Madame Blanc / Dr. Klemperer / Helena Markos

crew.name: Sayombhu Mukdeeprom
crew.original_name: สยมภู มุกดีพร้อม
